subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0232_01C9D951.8D758F40
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Another way to look at audible scrying-

The random audio is like a fortune=
 teller's crystal ball.

That's is what they are doing when they read their=
 crystal balls-scrying.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: April Aber=
crombie 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 1:2=
7 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.






  Yes-perfect ex=
ample of audible scrying.

  What's happening is that the random audio is j=
ust a background used for you to scry into. Infact, if this is what is happ=
ening, I bet if you could get the "Your mom is calling" message out of your=
 head and listen to that same track on another occasion, you may hear a com=
pletely different message.

  This could also be why Frank has reported tha=
t his messages change from what he first heard.

  In essence, it isn't the=
 physical recording sounds giving you the message, it is your subconscious =
mind.


    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Kristin Morris 
    To:=
 EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 11:01 AM
    Su=
bject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.



    Okay I have another one =
for you to think about.. I tape a session and review it later..  even a day=
 later.  Upon review the message that comes over is about something that 'j=
ust happened' while I was reviewing or happened after taping?  Is it possib=
le that spirit can manipulate the recording AFTER recording has stopped or =
even manipulate the audio while reviewing?


    An give you an example of =
this I was recording one day and I reviewed the audio the next day.  While =
reviewing - about half way through - the message "Your mother is calling" w=
as found.  I saved it and moved on and within two seconds my mom called.  Y=
ou say it is a coincidence except that I hadn't spoken to my mother in over=
 a year.  During this same conversation with her - we sorta made amends and=
 I told her the story of the 'secret' I had found out about a family member=
 having a child out of wedlock in the late 1920s.  Quick backstory.. I foun=
d out about this out-of-wedlock birth through my genealogy research and con=
tacted spirit through the box and I was promptly told to keep it secret and=
 which I promised to do.


    Well in this conversation with my mom after =
not speaking for a year I told her what I had found out.  When the telephon=
e conversation ended with my mom. I was amazed that the recording had told =
me she would call right be fore she did - even though the audio was recorde=
d the previous day.  I proceeded to go back to reviewing the audio and the =
very first thing I heard was:  THAT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE A SECRET - YOU LIED.=



    Maybe they can manipulate 'real-time' literally????


    k



-----=
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

  =
  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf =
Of April Abercrombie
    Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 11:36 AM
    To: EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.




=



    2 different things happening-that's why. When you get EVP that every=
one understands, it is outward, in the environment. Not a communication thr=
ough subconscious means.


    EVP that people swear they hear, but noone e=
lse can make sense, may be a message to them via subconscious means. That i=
sn't to say that ALL EVP's like this are true messages, I am sure alot are =
just matrixing.


    But then that is how the art of scrying starts-matrix=
ing. Like the Rorschach tests. The images you matrix with those gives the p=
sychologist an insight into your mind.


    By gazing into a dark, reflect=
ive surface, you start to see cloudy images. At first, you will just be mat=
rixing faces in the clouds and not getting much substance. Try it, you will=
 see what I am saying. With practice, you start to see clear, concise image=
s.


    I think that is what happening with audio as well.


    We alread=
y know for a fact pareidolia can occur in audio as well as visual stimulus.=



      ----- Original Message ----- 

      From: Eric VanDuzer 

      T=
o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 

      Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 10:19 AM

=
      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.


      yes I understan=
d its personal to that particular individual but why can't I hear it.  I ha=
ve gotten some very personal EVPs through the traditional investigation way=
 (not through a box or anything of that matter) that all others have heard.=


      On Wed, May 20, 2009 at 12:15 PM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrom=
bieghostresearch.com> wrote:


      "If one person is not meant to hear it=
 they won't hear it (I guess I am not quite ready to believe that one right=
 yet)." 


      I don't know for sure about that one either, but I am not =
ready to discount it either, especially since I stumbled across the possibi=
lity of audible scrying. But I am sure alot of people don't believe in scry=
ing at all either.


      What makes it a possibility to me is that so man=
y people are hearing things that are very personal, but stuff they would no=
t have come up with on their own.



        ----- Original Message ----- 
=

        From: Eric VanDuzer 

        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 

      =
  Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 10:09 AM

        Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re=
: I have a question.


        I think that is the problem I am having thou=
gh Jim.  When you say "work them over till you hear them"  to me I should n=
ot have to work them over till I hear them.  Yes taking out the ambient and=
 background noise is one thing.  But if you just keep on listening to them =
with different enhancements you are bound to hear something (matrixing).  I=
f one person is not meant to hear it they won't hear it (I guess I am not q=
uite ready to believe that one right yet).  I think you all know what I am =
getting at.  

        On Tue, May 19, 2009 at 9:11 PM, James W. Hyslope <c=
lockdryve@...> wrote:


        Well, for myself...I don't "clean" th=
em up to much because I really don't know HOW :) (well a little bit)Since I=
've only been at it for a couple weeks. BUT if you can clean up something t=
o where you can FIND what was there to begin with "you have done no harm" I=
 hear alot more than others I guess, and I haven't enhanced many of my evp'=
s.*If anyone is able to clean them up...I DO promise you will hear what I s=
ay is correct)Pretty BOLD statement, but if you are able to clean it up wit=
h better software (please do for others too) I will be more than happy to "=
listen" where I made a mistake...I can only LEARN from it :) I have done so=
me DEEP enhancements to a few of my evp's...from the begining I could only =
hear clicks and thumps.....but after messing with that area, eventually I w=
ould hear the true voices (and can tell if male or female...approximate age=
) and understand the mood also....these where extreamly modified, and I fee=
l that I could NOT have added enough "simple" enhancements that would ADD a=
 voice....full of emotion and distinct syllables :) And some just can't hea=
r them for what ever reason be it equipment that is used to hear (pc-headph=
ones-speakers-ears) know one has the perfect match of all these things. Che=
ck out "Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's" in the files section....work them over till yo=
u hear them. I really can't do much more :)--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, =
Eric VanDuzer <evanduzer@...> wrote:
        >
        > Now I may be biase=
d to the "investigation" way of doing things. I do clean
        > up evps =
if I hear something and can't make it out do to ambient noise. So
        >=
 hear is my question. When do you stop cleaning up? Wouldn't to much
      =
  > enhancing "taint" the results? To me the more enhancing you do the less=

        > convincing it becomes. I hope noone finds this offensive, it is =
not meant
        > to be I am just really curious. The way I look at it is=
 that if you have to
        > do so much enhancing to find anything, was t=
here really something there to
        > begin with. Are we just making our=
selves believe there is something there??
        > 
        > Eric
       =
 >
